name: Rocket Racer
description: Rocket Racer is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body, known as 'rossoCorsa', and a classic screen, it stands out from the rest. Equipped with rocket arms and legs, this agile robot can zoom around with incredible speed, making it the ultimate racer in the club. Its charming personality, combined with its advanced technological capabilities, make Rocket Racer a fan favorite among both humans and robots alike.
